comment: This strange looking move has a double purpose. Firstly, the Bishop no longer blocks the action of the Queen down the file, so that the possibility of ... Pd5 is open to Black The second point is that it vacates d7 for a Knight. An eventual ... Nfd7 will allow Black to play ... Nb6, forcing the hostile Bishop to declare its intentions. It also allows the move ... Pf6, protecting the e-pawn, and simultaeneously freeing the Bishop for action on the diagonal e8-h5
